DOC.brief_summary: Postmenopausal woman receive testosterone gel match placebo gel daily . Sebum excretion rate measure 6 week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Biomarkers Skin Androgenization Following Testosterone Administration ( 0000-015 ) ( COMPLETED ) .
DOC.criteria: Subject least 3 year postmenopausal Subject good general health Subject willing avoid excess alcohol strenuous physical activity study Subject donate unit blood take investigational drug another clinical trial last 4 week Subject regular user illicit drug Subject drink excessive amount coffee , tea cola Subject use estrogen progestogen hormone replacement therapy past 6 month Subject history cancer Subject acne
